data.name: Battle Chess 4000
data.detailed_description:
Battle Chess 4000 takes the classic game of chess and rushes it headlong into the future. Chess pieces become animated space-age characters, created from state-of-the-art digitized clay models; with the pieces animated moves being both intriguing and hilarious. Not only that but Battle Chess 4000 has a library of over 300,000 opening moves and an artificial intelligence that can handle any level of opponent.

Battle Chess 4000 features include:
- State-of-the-art animation from digitized clay models
- Learns as it plays
- Suitable for all levels of play from beginner to grandmaster
- Built-in chess clock
- Take back and replay moves in "What if" scenarios
- 2D and 3D modes
- Play solo, face to face or watch and learn as Battle Chess 4000 plays itself

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB of video memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended two-button mouse, or Apple mouse with Secondary Button / Secondary Click enabled.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM, OpenGL compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
